name: rTrakt
author: Subestro
short: Updates your Discord rich presence with your currently playing media on Trakt.
install_msg: To use this cog, you will need to provide your Trakt and OMDb API keys. You can get a Trakt API key by signing up for a developer account at https://trakt.docs.apiary.io/#introduction/authentication. You can get an OMDb API key by signing up at http://www.omdbapi.com/apikey.aspx. See the code for more information.

commands.name: Rsettrakt
commands.description: Set the Trakt API client ID

commands.name: Rsetsecret
commands.description: Set the Trakt API client secret

commands.name: Rsetredirect
commands.description: Set the Trakt API redirect URL
